title: Citi Named #1 Cash Management Bank in Latin America by Euromoney for the Third Consecutive Year
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi was voted, by corporations and non-financial institutions, as the #1 Regional Cash Management Bank in Latin America for the third consecutive year in Euromoney's prestigious annual Cash Management Survey 2017. Furthermore, the bank has been voted as #1 in a series of regional and by country categories.
tag-1: Citi Named #1 Cash Management Bank in Latin America by Euromoney for the Third Consecutive Year
tag-2: Miami, Florida – Citi was voted, by corporations and non-financial institutions, as the #1 Regional Cash Management Bank in Latin America for the third consecutive year in Euromoney's prestigious annual Cash Management Survey 2017. Furthermore, the bank has been voted as #1 in a series of regional and by country categories.
tag-4: "It is an honor for us to receive this award the third year in a row. The corporations participating in this survey have complex cash management needs in Latin America and across the globe," said Steve Donovan, Latin America Region Head, Treasury, and Trade Solutions. "We know that consistent, exceptional service builds customer loyalty and creates advocates out of our own customers. We are dedicated to delivering that level of service, and are working to improve each and every day."
tag-5: Euromoney's Cash Management Survey receives responses from the leading cash managers, treasurers, and financial officers worldwide, and is considered the benchmark survey for the global cash management industry. This is the 16th annual survey of the world's cash management industry. With a response base in excess of 30,000, this is the most authoritative and comprehensive ranking available.
tag-6: For this survey, Euromoney has standardized the way they award winners across these sections. Clients across the world are surveyed on their use of service providers, in this case for Cash Management services, and designate their top providers. A provider with the greatest market share globally, by region and by country is designated a Market Leader. Clients are also asked to assess the quality of service delivered by their providers. The providers receiving top assessments globally, by region, by country and within several categories and provisions of service earn the Best Service award. The Market Leader award replaces the traditional rankings and the Best Service award replaces the previous 'Star' ratings.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
